name: GridIron (itch)
description:
Welcome to the beta release of GridIron for the Commodore 16/+4.

The game requires you to collect tokens while avoiding the 4 enemy ships who will fire on you if you are on the same axis.

The game consists of 8 levels and a level designer and has hi-resolution graphics and sampled speech.

Bits in development.
No title screen music

Poor in-game sound effects (apart from speech)

Tape/disk load/save have not been validated yet.
